content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” disable_element=”yes” background_color=”custom” box_shadow=”0 10px 15px #ccc” custom_background_color=”#ededed” lg_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ md_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ border_radius=”7px”][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ md_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646902600006{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

Ukrainian refugees need your support

Right now, Ukrainian refugees are arriving in Northern France, and are facing longs waits to have their visa applications processed. We’ve been working tirelessly to help. This isn’t a simple process.

Whilst this has been happening there are also people who having escaped conflict are sleeping outside, in the rain, in the freezing temperatures, with no protection whatsoever.

Please donate now to allow us to help those fleeing conflict.

Thank you

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:%23donate|title:Donate%20now||” align=”center” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.enthuse.com%2Ffundraising%2Fstart%23!%2F|title:Fundraise%20for%20us|target:_blank” align=”center” animation=”none”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″][tm_image full_wide=”1″ align=”center” animation=”none” image=”34980″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The weather conditions in northern France have been worse than any year we can remember. The camps spread out across the area have become swamps, and the conditions for the refugees living here are atrocious.

People who are survivors of war, torture and trafficking, deserve to be treated with humanity and dignity. We are doing all we can to support them, but we are increasingly overwhelmed by the demand for humanitarian aid, and we need your help.

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html]JTNDYm9keSUzRSUzQ3N0eWxlJTNFJTIwYSUyMCU3QiUyMGNvbG9yJTNBJTIwJTIzRDIwMDAwJTNCJTIwJTdEJTIwYSUzQWhvdmVyJTIwJTdCJTIwY29sb3IlM0ElMjAlMjM0NDQlM0IlMjAlN0QlM0MlMkZzdHlsZSUzRSUzQyUyRmJvZHklM0U=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

If you’re a non-UK resident and would like to make a donation, please click here

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”donate”][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

If you’re experiencing technical issues whilst donating, please try via our alternative donation platform by clicking here, or get in touch.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” background_color=”custom” box_shadow=”0 10px 15px #ccc” custom_background_color=”#ededed” lg_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ md_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:10;margin_right:5;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:5″][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ md_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1632213973462{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

Make a donation

Right now, we are seeing refugees who don’t have clean clothes to change into and are wearing flip flops because they don’t own proper shoes.

They’ve been forced into dangerous journeys because their homes have been destroyed by war; families have been killed and people have suffered torture and abuse.

Our amazing volunteers are making heroic efforts to support them but we need your help.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:%23donate|title:Donate%20now||” align=”center” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.enthuse.com%2Ffundraising%2Fstart%23!%2F|title:Fundraise%20for%20us|target:_blank” align=”center” animation=”none”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″][tm_image full_wide=”1″ align=”center” animation=”none” image=”28980″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
